website_summaries.verdict: Rubber end caps help hold this beech wood bar steady for gymnasts up to 5 feet 6 inches and 140 lbs.
pros: Made of 1.5 inches beech wood Expands from 3 to 5 feet with locking knobs
Meant for gymnasts up to 5 feet 6 inches tall and 140 lbs
Rubber end caps hold the bar in place and also prevents any scratching on floors
cons: Recommended to be combined with 2 to 6 inches of matting, sold separately

customer_reviews.title: Great for at Home.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Very sturdy. My daughter is 10, and weighs about 60#s. It doesn't shift or wobble at all. I even tried it, and I weigh 130#s...it stayed in place and didn't wobble. I would recommend this, it's a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JGREFFIN

customer_reviews.title: My four and 6 year old daughters love this bar
customer_reviews.text: My four and 6 year old daughters love this bar! It is very sturdy as I have even done a flip on it (140lbs). Easy to assemble and to move up and down!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t have a more happier gymnast than my 10 year old!! Super sturdy and same as what she uses at her gymnastics class
customer_reviews.author: J. W. S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT SOLID BEECHWOOD BAR!  LIES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bar after spending time reviewing many products. I selected this one based on the claims of quality and durability. We had our bar a little less than 1 month when the "solid beechwood" bar began to peel off. I don't know what the core of the bar is made of, but the surface is just a sticker that looks like wood. I am extremely disappointed in the false advertising of this company. They state "Our bar is made from strong, smooth beechwood that won't splinter, wobble or break" but it is actually just a beechwood looking sticker that will peel after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Pre team gymnast gives it 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This bar was purchased for my daughter. She really enjoys practicing her gymnastics at home and when she is away from the gym. The one small thing that she has told me was she wished the bar was a little bit smaller in circumference. She is 5 and has small hands so it’s a little bit tough for a perfect grip. But we know she will grow into it more and the grip will be great. Highly recommend this bar! It’s super sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Bri L.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the quality I had hoped for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The first time we ordered the bar it was apparently lost, Amazon did a great job reimbursing me. The second bar ordered arrived quickly but when i opened the sealed bag of bolts one of the bolts were missing. Had to go to the hardware store for that. On final assembly, the holes on the bar that keep the bar from spinning are spaced wider than the bottom brace, pushing the long supports sidways. The bar is off balance and needs to be shimmed now. I don't expect a long life for the product due to the crafmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Yes

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy to assemble. Extremely sturdy. Gave it to my 7 year old granddaughter for her birthday and she loves it! Practicing her gymnastics bar skills at home now and having fun doing it! I would recommend this to anyone who has a young child in gymnastics. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for 6 & 8 year old gymnast to practice at home.
customer_reviews.text: Our Kids ages 6/8 love the bar. Very sturdy. The bar itself is very slippery compared to the one at the gym but the kids are figuring out how to get around it until it wears some. The only reason I’m giving 4 stars is the directions that come with it are horrible. Very frustrating, Nothing labeled to compare to steps and the picture directions is so tiny you can’t even make it out with magnifying glass. We figured it out without but would have been nice to make sure it was done right.
customer_reviews.author: Full House Mom

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Stable good quality bar
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the bar. Its constructed with heavy duty thick metal and solid hardwood. The base is large so it won't tip. The only minor thing is to put the bar all the way down, you have to loosen the screws on the outside facing posts as they can prevent the bar from sliding all the way down. Overall I am very happy and recommend this to anyone with a small child. My daughter is 5 and in dance and gymnastics and this appears it will work well for several years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Emick

customer_reviews.title: great for practice
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it. it has held up very well and show no signs of wear after a year of owning. highly suggest heavy chalking and maybe hand guards, as my daughter had bad blisters from the raw wood. she is on the bar religiously, so perhaps this wouldn't be an issue for anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. No surprises.
customer_reviews.text: Liked:Fast delivery. Well organized packaging (box was a bit worn). Minimal instructions unclear w.r.t placement of short and shortest bolts. No view on placement of lock washers (expect prior knowledge)
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: We love how sturdy/stable this is!
customer_reviews.text: My husband out this together in less than an hours time. My daughters have been using it for just over a week now and love it. It's very sturdy and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bar is bent!
customer_reviews.text: One of the bars is totally bent, making it impossible to align and put the pole in. If I can’t have my husband somehow straighten it, then I’ll be sending this back. Also, has terrible instructions on setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is for our 3 year old for Christmas, was missing some hardware and the box was ripped a bit and exposed upon delivery, it is super heavy though. It was easy for my husband to find hardware it needed and was easy to put together! It’s very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy J.

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday Present!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our daughter and she loves it! Its very sturdy...even her big brothers can use it! Its just like the ones at her gymnastics class. It goes low enough for her to reach on her own, which is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T Coulter

customer_reviews.title: great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for at home. My daughter loves this. She can practice at home when she not at the gym. Directions were lacking but I was able to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: brittany marbot

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT a solid wood bar.
customer_reviews.text: The bar is 100% a fiberglass tube. NOT A SOLID WOOD BAR. the product description is completely misleading in my opinion. it makes it seem like the bar is made of real wood. IT'S NOT WOOD. it's wrapped in a wood "sticker" that started peeling off after two months of use. The rest of the stand is really sturdy. it's just a shame they cheaped out on the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Siske

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her bar and the extra practice allows her to improve her skills! The bar is sturdy, excellent quality, and easy to adjust! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: phd

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this for about a year and it has been a great product. It is durable and sturdy. Great for any gymnast looking to practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Star Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I researched several different bars before purchasing this one. So far I am very satisfied. We didn’t look at the assembly instructions. It was very simple. It is surprisingly sturdy. Our daughter loves it. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kleinmomof3

customer_reviews.title: So easy, even a single mom (superhero) can do it! 🦸🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and super sturdy. My daughter and her friends love everything about this!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Garber

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and nonexistent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The product is not sturdy and the directions are horrible. After assembling and not fully tightening the bolts until the end (as directed) it became wobbly. I tried emailing the manufacturer with the included help email address and it is not even a valid email.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has spent a lot of time on it already. It is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift last year. Less than one year of use and the thin fake wood like covering is falling off the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Teran

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, intuitive to put together. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good bar!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and I’m impressed with the bar the only thing I’m disappointed is they shorted me one bolt for the bar so it wouldn’t turn. Other then that it’s an awesome bar!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Is as described. One flaw, first days use the wood sticker on the pole started to peel. Would be much better to just provide a wood pole.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Calabrese

customer_reviews.title: Horrible directions but it does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon shipped fast. Directions to assemble were horrible. They don't tell you what washers to use. A number of the beams are uneven as you can see from the photos. I am sure my daughter who is 8 will love it though.
customer_reviews.author: so cool you have to get it

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly, was easy to put together and built solid. I used it with my daughter and I weight 180lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Darrick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love the bar. They have been on it nonstop since we put it together. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the bar for 5 months and it is peeling on both ends.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ponting

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and extremely easy to put together. Perfect for our little gymnast.
customer_reviews.author: William Wright

customer_reviews.title: best gift for a gymnast
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is 6 and is just now beginning competing absolutely loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. The bars are stable and don’t wobble. My daughter loved these bars.
customer_reviews.author: sheila dalton

customer_reviews.title: Quality is questionable *update to first review* EAK has fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: It appears sturdy, but every piece has rust. When delivered, the box looked like it had been through a war zone. Contemplating returning, but this thing weighs over 60 lbs *Update* complete customer satisfaction. EAK stands behind their product. Rating changed from 2 to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: First review ever!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this bar for any level of gymnast. My 5 year old daughter hasn’t gotten off of it long enough to eat since she got it as a Christmas present. I was dreading putting it together, but it went together really easily. Good buy. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Nate H.

customer_reviews.title: The bar is great, however,  85lbs is bit heavy for the bar.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 10 years old and loves to flip. However, this bar wobbles although the weight limit states 140lbs would be okay. Maybe, if you get your child this bar try to find something to hold it down. Any suggestions??????
customer_reviews.author: TPARTYCOLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This bar is very sturdy and durable for an affordable price. It’s also easy to assemble and comes in several colors. My daughter loves her pink one!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy. It does move a bit when my daughter does tricks, but she just needs to get used to that. It doesn't move a lot, but some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: XTEK Gym Pro Gymnastics Bar - Adjustable Height Kip Bar with Added Stability, Premium Gymnastics Equipment Home Training - Gymnastic Bar
feature_bullets: SOLID AND SAFE PRO GRADE DESIGN — When it comes to gymnastics equipment, quality counts. Unlike other bars, our gymnastic bar won’t wiggle or wobble. That’s because our kip bar features a 6-point base and industrial rubber end caps. Ideally suited for gymnasts levels 1-4 and under 140lbs, you can rest assured that your future acrobats will train safely when you choose XTEK Gymnastic equipment!

DUAL LOCKING ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT BAR — Our adjustable gymnastic bar is engineered with athletes of all sizes in mind! Simply turn and pull the knob to change the bar from 3-5 feet. This bar is perfect for young gymnasts as it can be adjusted to their height as they grow.

A GREAT GIFT THATS EASY TO ASSEMBLE — Intuitively designed, this professional grade gymnastic bar is quickly and easily put together with the included instructions. Whether you plan on using it at home or at your local gymnastics center, you will be training on your brand new XTEK Gym Bar within minutes of receiving it!

BACKED BY 3-YEAR WARRANTY — Every gymnastic bar we build passes through a rigorous quality assurance process. We are so confident that your daughter or son will enjoy their new XTEK Gym Pro Kip Bar, we offer a 3-year warranty.

RECOMMENDED BY GYMNASTS AND COACHES — Parents and coaches alike praise the quality, safety, and construction of our professional grade gymnastics bar. Designed specifically for young gymnasts levels 1-4, our bar is created for use at home or your local gymnastics training facility.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
